data.approach: Building Svelte 5 component following ReviewRulesEditor pattern. Features: 1) Rules list with drag-reorder, 2) Add/edit/delete rules, 3) Condition builder (label/type/priority with operators), 4) Agent+model dropdowns, 5) Sample task preview. Using existing routing API endpoints.

summary: Implemented drag-drop rule reordering with visual feedback
Built condition builder with type/operator/value for label, type, priority, project, epic
Added agent and model selection dropdowns
Implemented live preview for testing routing against sample tasks
Included fallback indicator showing default agent usage
Modal-based rule editor with full CRUD support
reviewFocus: Verify component works with existing API endpoints
